title: Trusted Employee
description: We have a solid employer-employee relationship built on mutual benefit, with a trust score of 62.41 indicating positive but not absolute trust. They work at my Contract Stall at Calle dei Mercanti Orafi, where I rely on their services while providing them with steady employment and income. Though our relationship is primarily professional rather than personal, with a relatively low strength score of 0.86, it remains an important business connection for both of us in Venice's commercial landscape.
